mainContent:
SkullyMVC is not Rails, nor Yii

  • The elegance of this framework is in its mobility. You can deploy it anywhere with ease since it is written in PHP
  • SkullyMVC was never intended for complex module-inheritance system. There is no core module anywhere. It is simply a skeleton to help you started on an MVC structure.
  • Treat the code just like one of your own. Edit anything you feel required. Add ANY PHP plugin.

SkullyMVC is not Wordpress, either

  • There is a reason this framework is called SkullyMVC, not SkullyCMS. Nope, you won't get CMS-like capabilities, not directly as you install, anyway.
  • Instead, with this piece of framework you can build anything you like. You can quickly build your own Multi-language CMS with this. Do you want a CMS without database? Yes you can have it directly? Do you want a shopping cart? With some effort, sure you can build it yourself.
